channel.description: Recent content in Greedy on long·pf

item.title: 44. Wildcard Matching 通配符匹配
item.description: Given an input string (s) and a pattern (p), implement wildcard pattern matching with support for '?' and '*'. '?' Matches any single character. '*' Matches any sequence of characters (including the empty sequence). The matching should cover the entire input string (not partial). Note: s could be empty and contains only lowercase letters a-z. p could be empty and contains only lowercase letters a-z, and characters like ?
